Article Title: Noida techies defend flying kiss gesture after viral video, claim it was for child in car
Article Text:
Two techies held for harassing woman from moving car in Noida





NOIDA: Two software engineers were arrested for allegedly pulling up alongside a family's car in a moving SUV and harassing a woman with lewd gestures, remarks and blown kisses.Police said the incident occurred on Saturday night as the Greater Noida West family — a man, his wife and child — drove towards Sector 18.Trouble began near Parthala roundabout, where a red MG Hector started following their vehicle.As the SUV drew level, its occupants allegedly rolled down a window and began making obscene gestures and inappropriate signals at the man's wife, who was seated in the rear seat.The two accused, police said, tried to force the woman's attention by waving, shouting and blowing kisses in their direction.Sensing the seriousness of what was happening, the man recorded a video from inside his car. Soon after, the SUV sped away, he alleged.On Sunday, the man posted the clip of the incident on X, tagging UP Police and the chief minister, and demanding strict action.Police said that the vehicle number visible in the video became the key lead.A case was subsequently registered against unknown persons, and police teams began scanning CCTV footage from nearby areas to track the SUV's route.A team from Phase-3 police station later traced the two accused to Sector 135 and arrested them on Sunday evening.They were identified as Amit Kumar of Azamgarh and Abhishek of Mainpuri. Both of the accused live in a rented accommodation at JVS Society in Sector 135 and work as engineers at a Noida-based IT company.The MG Hector, bearing registration number UP 75 AH 3565, was seized.During interrogation, police said, the men admitted they had too much to drink at a party earlier that evening and were roaming the city when they harassed the family."Further legal proceedings are underway," police officials said.According to police sources, the two showed cops a video in which they appeared to blow kisses towards the child in the car.
Article Summary: Two software engineers were arrested for allegedly pulling up alongside a family's car in a moving SUV and harassing a woman with lewd gestures. The incident occurred on Saturday night as the Greater Noida West family — a man, his wife and child — drove towards Sector 18.

Article Title: Toxic revenge in school: Ahmedabad student falls sick after classmate mixes chemical in his water bottle following spat
Article Text: AHMEDABAD: A Class 6 student at a private school in Maninagar area of Ahmedabad allegedly mixed a chemical substance into a classmate's water bottle following a verbal altercation, raising concerns over student safety on school premises.Ahmedabad city district education officer Rohit Chaudhary confirmed the incident, which took place at Durga School around four days ago. "The two students had a verbal exchange a few days earlier. Allegedly nursing a grudge, one of them added a chemical tablet to the other student's water bottle while it was kept in the classroom," Chaudhary said.Unaware of the contamination, the affected student consumed some water but stopped after noticing an unusual smell. Shortly thereafter, the child began vomiting. Teachers immediately informed the school management, and the student underwent medical treatment.Given the seriousness of the incident, the school management reviewed CCTV footage installed on the campus. Officials said the footage showed a student mixing a tablet into the water bottle. Both students were questioned, and their parents were called to the school.Officials stated that the affected student was stable and no further medical complications were reported. The matter was mutually resolved by the parents, who decided not to lodge a police complaint.School trustee H N Patel and principal Ketan Shah were unavailable for comment.The incident comes amid growing concern over student safety in the city schools. In Jan, a Class 10 student was assaulted by a mob outside National School in Ghatlodia, while an earlier fatal assault outside Seventh Day Adventist School in Sep 2025 raised questions about student behaviour and supervision
Article Summary: A Class 6 student at a private school in Ahmedabad allegedly mixed a chemical substance into a classmate's water bottle following a verbal altercation. The affected student consumed some water but stopped after noticing an unusual smell. Shortly thereafter, the child began vomiting. Teachers immediately informed the school management, and the student underwent medical treatment.

Article Title: Hate speech bill sent to President Droupadi Murmu; ‘deliberate bid to dump it in cold storage,’ says Karnataka HM G Parameshwara
Article Text:
Karnataka Home Minister G Parameshwara





BENGALURU: Karnataka home minister G Parameshwara Monday alleged governor Thaawar Chand Gehlot has referred Hate Speech and Hate Crime (Prevention) Bill to President Droupadi Murmu, which he said was a deliberate bid to “dump it in cold storage”.The bill, passed by both Houses during the winter session in Belagavi, was sent to Gehlot in Dec. Parameshwara told reporters that the governor has questioned 28 points in the bill. “If the President sends it back to us with her observations, then we will do something and send it again (for gubernatorial assent),” he said. He said the bill was brought consciously and defended it as a necessary safeguard. “We have freedom of speech, but that does not mean that one can say anything. We have to see how it impacts our society. Hence, the bill was introduced,” he said. He said there were instances of hate speech that made govt think of bringing a law.Targeting BJP, Parameshwara said, “If you still say that this is not proper, then what are your motives? Should it mean that anyone can abuse anyone? Should we allow any disturbance in society?”He alleged the governor did not want the bill to become a law. “In my opinion, the Governor has intentionally referred it to the President, so that it does not come into effect.He wants it to be shelved forever,” Parameshwara said. Asked about similar developments in Kerala and Tamil Nadu, he said, “Let’s see what happens in the coming days. I think things will improve.”BJP state chief Vijayendra said the Congress govt brought the bill with the sole intention of suppressing the opposition and curbing democratic voices in the state. He criticised the way the legislation was cleared during the Belagavi session, alleging it was rushed through.“This bill is dangerous to the democratic system. In Tarikere (Chikkamagaluru district), Vikas Puttur, a Hindu activist, had not even begun his speech; police officials went there and served him a notice, threatening to arrest him if he spoke,” Vijayendra said.On the governor not giving assent, Vijayendra said, “The proposed legislation itself was flawed and aimed at silencing the opposition.”
Article Summary: Karnataka home minister G Parameshwara alleged governor Thaawar Chand Gehlot has referred Hate Speech and Hate Crime (Prevention) Bill to President Droupadi Murmu. He said the bill was brought consciously and defended it as a necessary safeguard.

Article Title: Multiple earthquakes hit Bay Area as Super Bowl week begins — should fans be worried or not?
Article Text:
(Getty Image)

literally

Multiple earthquakes shook the region early Monday

some minor incidents

Why this happened: normal Bay Area seismic activity

It wasa shaky start to Super Bowl week in the San Francisco Bay Area on Monday morning. A series of earthquakes rattled the region, including a **magnitude 4.2 tremor just as fans, teams, and media were starting to arrive ahead of Super Bowl LX festivities. Thankfully, there are no reports of major damage or serious injuries but residents and transit authorities definitely felt it.The United States Geological Survey recorded multiple earthquakes near San Ramon, California, early Monday. The largest was measured at magnitude 4.2 around 7:01 a.m., and dozens of smaller quakes occurred before and after it in roughly a 90-minute span.Seismic activity ranged from around 2.5 up to 4.2 magnitude with the earliest noticeable tremors starting around 6:27 a.m. before the strongest hit. Locals reported feeling shaking in areas as far as Oakland, Richmond, San Leandro and eastern parts of San Francisco.The quakes happened at the very start of a massive week in the Bay Area. With Super Bowl LX scheduled for Sunday at Levi’s Stadium, thousands of fans, media and NFL personnel are already in the region for events and festivities and many felt the shaking.Despite the timing, there’s no indication these earthquakes have affected official Super Bowl operations or event schedules so far.While there have beenlike items falling off store shelves but no serious damage or injuries have been reported from the quake swarm.Local transit officials, including Bay Area Rapid Transit (BART), slowed trains temporarily to conduct track safety inspections after the tremors. Riders were warned to expect delays of up to 20 minutes systemwide while crews checked infrastructure.The Bay Area sits on a tangle of active fault lines, including the Calaveras Fault and earthquake swarms aren’t unusual for the region. Experts say clusters of smaller quakes often occur without indicating a major quake is imminent.This particular swarm fits a pattern, San Ramon and the broader East Bay have seen frequent small tremors in recent months. Scientists note this kind of activity tends to happen in sequences and is part of the area’s ongoing seismicity.For locals, the shaking was a noticeable Monday morning jolt and for visitors here for Super Bowl week, it was an unexpected experience. But so far, everything from transit systems to event plans remains operational and intact.If anything, the earthquake activity serves as a reminder that being in the Bay Area means living with seismic risk even during one of the biggest sports weeks of the year.
Article Summary: The United States Geological Survey recorded multiple earthquakes near San Ramon, California, early Monday. The largest was measured at magnitude 4.2 around 7:01 a.m., and dozens of smaller quakes occurred before and after it in roughly a 90-minute span. Locals reported feeling shaking in areas as far as Oakland, Richmond, San Leandro and eastern parts of San Francisco.

Article Title: Ajit Pawar’s son Parth Pawar breaks down while holding father’s chair at NCP office in Mumbai
Article Text:
Sunetra Pawar To Be Named NCP Leader, Dy CM Oath Likely Tomorrow: Chhagan Bhujbal

(With agency inputs)





MUMBAI: Parth Pawar, the elder son of late NCP leader Ajit Pawar , was overcome with emotion during ceremonial prayers held at the party office on Sunday, where his father’s ashes were brought for rituals. Visibly distressed, Parth was seen holding and hugging Ajit Pawar’s empty chair, breaking down as he paid tribute to his father.The emotional scene unfolded during the prayer ceremony organised after Ajit Pawar, who died in a plane crash in Baramati on January 28, was remembered by party leaders and workers at the NCP office.Meanwhile, NCP Maharashtra president and Lok Sabha MP Sunil Tatkare said the ashes of Ajit Pawar would be taken to all districts of the state to allow people to pay their respects. After the public homage, the ashes would be immersed locally, he added.Tatkare also asserted that the NCP would continue to remain part of the BJP-led NDA and move forward on the ideology and path laid down by the late Ajit Pawar.Addressing speculation over merger talks, Tatkare questioned the timing of such discussions, asking why they were being raised even before Ajit Pawar’s last rites had been completed. He said he had not made any comments on the issue but a narrative was being created suggesting otherwise.Tatkare further said the NCP joined the NDA while remaining committed to its secular ideology and the principles of social justice inspired by Shivaji Maharaj, Jyotiba Phule, Shahu Maharaj and B R Ambedkar, adding that the decision carried the mandate of the people of Maharashtra.

Article Title: Mumbai BMC mayoral election: BJP corporators frontrunners for jt group leader; Sena insists on 1.25-yr mayorship
Article Text:
“Democracy Sliding Into ICU”: Opposition Targets BJP As BMC Polls Trigger Political Storm





MUMBAI: With the BJP and Shiv Sena set to register their groups for the BMC on Monday, BJP corporators Ganesh Khankar and Prabhakar Shinde have emerged as frontrunners for the post of group leaders. Sena functionaries said the two parties are likely to register a joint MahaYuti group if the BJP agrees to its power-sharing formula and assures it of the Mayor’s post for at least 1.25 years, if not a full 2.5-year term.Khankar is an old BJP hand and a corporator from Borivli, while Shinde is a senior BJP corporator from Mulund. Shinde was in the Sena before and joined the BJP in 2017, and was also the BJP’s group leader when the BMC’s term ended in 2022.He was also a member of the Standing Committee.If Khankar becomes the BJP’s group leader, he will be the leader of the house as the BJP is the single-largest party. In this case, Shinde will be afrontrunner to become Chairperson of the all-important Standing Committee. While the group leader’s post is for a period of 5 years, unless the appointee is changed by the party, the term of the Standing Committee Chairperson is only 1 year, and elections for the Chairperson take place every year.“The party wants to nominate an original BJP man as the group leader. Plus, the nominee has to be Marathi. So, Khankar fits this bill. Prabhakar Shinde, on the other hand, is from the Sena originally but a very experienced hand, so he will be more suitable to handle the Standing Committee,” said a senior BJP functionary. Functionaries said a power-sharing formula between the two parties was finalised, and while the BJP will head the joint group with its group leader, the whip of the group of 118 corporators will be from the Sena. So, even though the Sena loses one group leader’s post, they will still have control of the joint group through a Sena whip.Similarly, the BJP is likely to keep the Mayor’s post and Standing Committee Chairperson’s post, while the Sena is likely get the Chairperson of the Improvements, Health and BEST Committee, and the Deputy Mayor’s post. Sena corporator Amey Ghole is likely to be the Sena’s whip.While a final call on the joint registration will be made between CM Devendra Fadnavis and DCM Eknath Shinde, functionaries said the path for a joint group registration was largely cleared.
Article Summary: BJP corporators Ganesh Khankar and Prabhakar Shinde have emerged as frontrunners for the post of group leaders. Sena functionaries said the two parties are likely to register a joint MahaYuti group if the BJP agrees to its power-sharing formula.

Article Title: 'Ill-conceived': US federal judge orders release of 5-year-old Liam Conejo and his father, slams ICE

Article Title: Celebrity doctor Peter Attia breaks silence over crude email sent to Epstein: I had little exposure, his access felt novel
Article Text: Celebrity doctor and anti-aging physician Peter Attia, who is also a contributor to CBS News, broke his silence about the crude email that he sent to sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, released in the latest tranche of files drop. The Canadian-American author, researcher did not deny the crude email but said he was not involved in any criminal activity, was never on his plane and his infamous private island. Attia said he was never present at any sex party but is embarassed of the tasteless, indefensible emails that he wrote to Epstein.The email from him was sent to Epstein after his conviction."In June 2015, I sent Epstein an email with the subject line 'Got a fresh shipment'. The email contained a photograph of bottles of metformin, a medication I had just received from the pharmacy for my own use. The subject line referred to the picture of the bottles of medication. He replied with the words “me too” and attached a photograph of an adult woman. I responded with crude, tasteless banter. Reading that exchange now is very embarrassing, and I will not defend it. I’m ashamed of myself for everything about this. At the time, I understood this exchange as juvenile, not a reference to anything dark or harmful."Attia said that at that point in his career, he had little exposure to prominent people and Epstein's access felt novel. "Everything about him seemed excessive and exclusive, including the fact that he lived in the largest home in all of Manhattan, owned a Boeing 727, and hosted parties with the most powerful and prominent leaders in business and politics. I treated that access as something to be quiet about rather than discussed freely with others. "Attia said he was never Epstein's doctor but he answered general medical questions and recommended other providers to him. Attia said he was repulsed when he learned about the investigation against Epstein in 2018. "At that point, I told him directly he needed to accept responsibility for what he did," he wrote.Attia was mentioned in the Epstein Files 1741 times and the most outrageous was the email that he himself mentioned in his statement where he said female genitals could be counted as "low carb".Attia's fans were heartbroken as the emails were made public. They matched one particular timeline with what he wrote in his book. In his book Outlive: The Science and Art of Longevity, Attia wrote about a particular incident that took place on July 11, 2017. His wife Jill called him and informed him that their son suddenly stopped breathing. “When Jill called me from the ambulance, I was in New York, in a taxi on Fifty-Fourth Street, on my way to dinner,” Attia wrote. “After she finished telling me the story, I just said, without a shred of emotion, ‘Okay, call me when you get to the hospital, so I can talk to the doctors in the ICU.’”In his book, he elaborated that he stayed in New York because he had some important work, while his son had a cardiac arrest.An email exchange on July 12, 2017, shows Attia was planning to meet Epstein the next morning.In his statement, Attia, however, did not address this particular event as he apologized for his overall association with Epstein.
Article Summary: Peter Attia said he was never present at any sex party but is embarassed of the tasteless, indefensible emails that he wrote to Epstein. Attia was mentioned in the Epstein Files 1741 times and the most outrageous was the email where he said female genitals could be counted as "low carb"

Article Title: Piers Morgan reacts strongly as Candace Owens podcast sparks outrage over Erika Kirk jokes and Charlie Kirk theories
Article Text:
Piers Morgan reacts strongly as Candace Owens podcast sparks outrage over Erika Kirk jokes and Charlie Kirk theories (Image via Getty)

Piers Morgan slams Candace Owens and Bassem Youssef over Erika Kirk remarks







The online fight around Charlie Kirk took a sharp turn after Piers Morgan publicly called out comments made on Candace Owens’ podcast. Morgan said it was wrong to joke about Erika Kirk. The backlash started after Bassem Youssef appeared on Owens’ show on January 29. During their talk, they discussed a leaked Zoom call involving Erika Kirk and Turning Point USA staff. Candace Owens questioned Erika Kirk’s behavior during that call, focusing on her facial expressions and tone.Soon after, a short clip from the podcast went viral. In that clip, Youssef made a remark that many viewers felt crossed a line. Piers Morgan reacted strongly, saying humor should never target a woman already facing public pressure. His comments added fuel to an already heated debate that had moved far beyond facts and into speculation.After the clip spread on X, Piers Morgan responded directly to Youssef. He wrote, “Why do you find it so funny to mock a young widow who has been dragged into public attacks? It is disgusting.” Morgan has repeatedly said that claims about Charlie Kirk are not supported by verified evidence.Youssef fired back at Morgan online. He questioned the credibility of official explanations and accused public figures of pretending to care while ignoring what he called unanswered questions.In his reply, Youssef criticized how grief is judged in public and suggested people do not trust investigations, though he provided no new proof.Earlier on the podcast, Youssef also mocked how Erika Kirk’s grief was discussed online, making comments that many listeners felt were cruel rather than funny. Candace Owens did not directly push back during that moment. Instead, the conversation moved to other topics, including Israel and media power.Piers Morgan has challenged Candace Owens on similar claims before on Piers Morgan Uncensored. He has praised her debating skills but said he believes she promotes unverified theories for attention and money. In January, Morgan also hosted Jeremy Boreing, who criticized Owens for targeting former allies and chasing clicks.In December, Morgan invited Owens back on his show and made a clear offer. If her claims were proven true, he would publicly praise her work. If not, he said she should openly admit she was wrong. That challenge still stands, as no verified evidence has backed the claims discussed on her podcast.
Article Summary: Piers Morgan publicly called out comments made on Candace Owens' podcast. Morgan said it was wrong to joke about Erika Kirk. The backlash started after Bassem Youssef appeared on Owens’ show on January 29. He questioned the credibility of official explanations and accused public figures of pretending to care.
